name: Home Run Derby (itch) (mike7a)
description:
Thank you for taking interest in Home Run Derby!

This game was designed for online use, so all the online functionality was stripped from this version.  The online version is updated daily and can be freely accessed at www.fallingcode.com/HRD.  I'm nowhere near done developing this game.

I strived/strive to make this game as realistic as possible!  The hit metrics are based on real scaled values of the game environment.  They're not made up.  They're all based on your reaction time and hand-eye coordination.

Click options and change the difficulty to "Simulation" for a more realistic and challenging experience.

Explore the park.  Move your mouse cursor over the water in centerfield.

I'd greatly appreciate any feedback, so if you have any, let me know in the comment section below.
